Comments
There are a couple campus police that are great!
I do not know what this is.
There are many different societies on campus.
This college is great for student seeking to grow spiritually in Christ as well as intellectually.
Each new president plants a tree on campus in honor of themselves.

Blue Mountain College is such a wonderful college because all of the faculty truly want to invest in each students life. They want to see everyone succeed. This college has a desire to see students also grow closer to The Lord which is fantastic!
Most students entertain themselves at Blue Mountain. There is a disk golf course now. The new president is doing a lot of new activities with students.
The cafeteria is great most of the time. The ladies that fix the food work very hard in giving us great food. They have a decent variety.
The dorm life is great! There is rarely anything crazy that goes on. It involves good clean fun for the most part.
This college focuses mainly on academics. The faculty go out of their way to help each student successfully achieve their degrees. They want to help each student learn.
This is a great college to attend. Be prepared to learn a lot both intellectually and Biblically.
Blue Mountain College is a very well respected college. It is Christ-like and classy. I love this college.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {38225=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 13449=Blue Mountain is an excellent school for students looking for small classes and professors that take an interest in their students. The location, set in a small town, is a perfect spot away from distractions, unlike larger colleges in the area. The campus is beautiful and historic, yet provides all of the academic needs of a student in 2012.}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot This college is a great small college with a Christian atmosphere. Small classroom sizes and a great education program make this college outstanding. Login to rate or flag the reviews Kayleigh from Blue Mountain, MS 03/29/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 7 Categories Comments Campus Safety This is the best part about being located in a small town. I have always felt safe on campus, matter what time of day. They are also there if you ever lock your keys in your car! Great for these types of students BmC is known for their education and ministry programs so it is ideal for students going into these professions.
